Title: Authorizes municipalities to establish a history, arts, and culture levy
Summary: Authorizes municipalities to establish a history, arts, and culture levy to support history, arts, and culture; exempts such levy from the real property tax levy limit.
LawCode: Add ยง6-w, amd ยง3-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to authorizing municipalities to establish a history, arts, and culture levy
